name: ViewletBuilder Project File
summary: Learn about .QVP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: QVP files can save several different ViewletBuilder project types, including screen capture, image, PowerPoint, and quiz projects.

description: Project file created by ViewletBuilder, a program used for creating interactive Flash presentations; contains resources for the project, such as screenshots, images, and audio files; can be exported to a Flash-based Web presentation.
